text: Jyanna talaka dila gela tya (ghatasphotita) striyanni svatahla tina masika pali ye'ipaparyanta rokhuna thevave. Tyancyakarita he ucita navhe ki allahane tyacya udarata je nirmana kele asela, tyala lapavave, jara tyance allahavara ani kayamatacya divasavara imana asela. Tyancya patila ya mudatita, tyanna parata yenyaca purna hakka ahe, jara tyanca irada sudharana karanyaca asela. Striyancehi taseca hakka aheta, jase tyancyavara purusance bhala'isaha aheta. Matra purusanna striyanvara sresthata prapta ahe ani allaha jabaradasta hikamata rakhanara ahe
